definition: one's employment/business/matter that needs to be settled/(northern dialect) (of a person) demanding/trying/troublesome/erhua variant of 事[shi4]/CL:件[jian4],樁|桩[zhuang1]
to have spare time/free from work/it's not important/it's nothing/never mind
erhua variant of 當回事|当回事[dang4 hui2 shi4]

sentences.english: He is only teasing. Don't take it so seriously.
sentences.chinese: 他不過是戲弄而已，別太當回事兒。

sentences.english: Even those on the outside know about it.
I was a little tired yesterday, but I'm OK now.
sentences.chinese: 昨天還有點累，現在沒事兒了。

sentences.english: I asked him about it he said "I don't know what you're talking about Megan".
sentences.chinese: 我回短信問他怎麼回事兒，他說“你說什麼哪梅根”。

sentences.english: Shier on the back, you say nothing of it personally, you will when I put a bunch of fart.
sentences.chinese: 上回的事兒，你甭往心裏去，你就當我放了一串屁。

sentences.english: As it happens it's been a very profitable non-event.
sentences.chinese: 沒想到這件事情成了件很賺錢的小事兒。

sentences.english: For example on the Wangzhuan thing.
Mr. Jones: Oh, right. You're busy with that contract. Maybe you could join us later?
sentences.chinese: 噢，對了。你正忙合同的事兒，也許你能晚點兒來？

sentences.english: Life is long because of all the small things. The slow pace.
sentences.chinese: 有了這些小事兒，生命才顯得長久。

sentences.english: She is looking forward to that being said at the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 她正盼望這事兒在會上說說。

sentences.english: Lu AI Gong more surprised, how can such a thing?
sentences.chinese: 魯哀公更加驚奇了，怎麼會有這種事兒呢？

sentences.english: I get so upset when you just try to ignore the problem.
sentences.chinese: 你都不想管這事兒，我還挺生氣的。

sentences.english: If you enter my area, then you're going to pay the price.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想在我這兒找事兒，那你就交費吧。

sentences.english: Do you have time to run some errands for my mom?
sentences.chinese: 你有時間爲我母親辦點雜事兒嗎？

sentences.english: We had just gotten to America and everybody else had gotten off.
sentences.chinese: 我們剛剛到達美國，別的人都沒事兒。
